017package org.apache.commons.chain.impl;
018
019import org.apache.commons.chain.Chain;
020import org.apache.commons.chain.Command;
021import org.apache.commons.chain.Context;
022import org.apache.commons.chain.Filter;
023
024/**
025 * Implementation of {@link Filter} that logs its identifier and
026 * and delegates to the rest of the chain.
027 *
028 * @author Craig R. McClanahan
029 * @version $Revision$ $Date$
030 */
031public class DelegatingFilter extends NonDelegatingFilter {
032
033    // ------------------------------------------------------------ Constructor
034
035    public DelegatingFilter() {
036        this("", "");
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Construct an instance that will log the specified identifier
041     *
042     * @param id1 first identifier to log for this Command instance
043     * @param id2 second identifier to log for this Command instance
044     */
045    public DelegatingFilter(String id1, String id2) {
046        super(id1, id2);
047    }
048
049    // -------------------------------------------------------- Command Methods
050
051    /**
052     * Execution method for this Command
053     *
054     * @param context The {@link Context} to be processed by this
055     *        {@link Command}
056     *
057     * @return {@code true} if the processing of this {@link Context}
058     *         has been completed, or {@code false} if the processing
059     *         of this {@link Context} should be delegated to a
060     *         subsequent {@link Command} in an enclosing {@link Chain}
061     *
062     * @throws Exception general purpose exception return
063     *         to indicate abnormal termination
064     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code context}
065     *         is {@code null}
066     */
067    @Override
068    public boolean execute(Context context) throws Exception {
069        super.execute(context);
070        return false;
071    }
072}
